source_sentence: 此是一切諸法入無量門陀羅尼。
translation: This is the dhāraṇī of the innumerable approaches to all dharmas.
If a bodhisattva attains this dhāraṇī.
He can uphold the teachings of all the buddhas.
He can travel to all the buddha-realms.

source_sentence: 能持一切聲聞緣覺所說。
translation: He can maintain what's taught by all the śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas.

source_sentence: 一切世間經書醫方呪術圍陀經典悉能持之。
translation: He can maintain all the worldly scriptures, medical prescriptions, incantations, and texts of the Vedas.

source_sentence: 一切眾生言語能出能入。
translation: He can produce and enter the speech of all sentient beings.
He can know the minds of all sentient beings.
He well knows the words and sounds of all languages.

source_sentence: 如其言音能即至如是一切道中。
translation: According to their speech and sounds, they can immediately reach thusness in all paths.

source_sentence: 能知實不實法得念堅固。
translation: He can know real and unreal things and attain a mindfulness that's resolute.
It's an offering that all bodhisattvas should make.

source_sentence: 能以一指動一切諸佛世界。
translation: With one finger, he can move all the buddha-realms.
It can cause those sentient beings to have no thoughts of fear.
With a single thought, he can know the three worlds.
It can end doubt and remorse in all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 能使眾生修決定行更無疑滯。
translation: It can cause sentient beings to cultivate resolute practice and not be hindered by doubt.

source_sentence: 常得善念終不依事諸天。
translation: They'll always attain good mindfulness and never rely on the gods.
He attains measureless samādhis.
They'll attain knowledge of past lives.
He'll always attain birth by transformation and won't be subject to the constancy of birth in the womb.
He'll sit on a lotus flower and never be born in a bad rebirth.
He'll receive a body, and if he receives a body, he'll find a place.
There are no insect pockets in his body.

source_sentence: 於一切生處常得是陀羅尼。
translation: He'll always attain this dhāraṇī in all places of birth.
They'll never be born in a land without a buddha.
He'll always attain inexhaustible precious hands.
He'll attain the adornment of a buddha land.
He attains the skillful means to teach sentient beings as they really are.
He can know everything that sentient beings do.
He can know the good and unskillful thoughts of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 能知一切外道所修行法。
translation: He can know the ways practiced by all non-Buddhists.

source_sentence: 得樂說方便得無盡藏陀羅尼。
translation: He attains the skillful means of teaching with pleasure and attains the inexhaustible store dhāraṇī.
He attains the dhāraṇī of wholesome joy ...
He attains the pāśumitra dhāraṇī.
He attains the dhāraṇī of immeasurable praise.
He attains the dhāraṇī of hearing and retaining everything.
He attains the dhāraṇī of fearlessness.
"Furthermore, it's honored.
To summarize, this person can attain a tiny number of dust motes in the space between all the buddhas and the Dharma realm.

source_sentence: 是人能得一切佛剎虛空法界微塵數不忘陀羅尼。

translation: 'Ajñāta-knowledge, Bhāviveka-knowledge, Na-knowledge, and Ya-nāma-knowledge.' Ajñāta-knowledge, Bhāviveka-knowledge, Mahākāśyapa, Mahākāśyapa, Bhāviveka-knowledge, and Śubhajāpatī are able to recall the events of 12 worlds by themselves.
Ānanda.

source_sentence: 此呪是八十二億諸佛所說。
translation: This dhāraṇī was taught by eighty-two billion buddhas.

source_sentence: 阿踦　摩踦　那踦　那祈尼　那伽娑離　娑羅尼離　闍醯離闍醯羅婆帝禪帝離禪帝羅婆帝能自憶念十三世事。
translation: Ābhin Mahābhin Nāgasanī Nāgasanī Śāraṇī Ājñālapatī Śāraṇī Ājñālapatī Ābhin Mahābhin Nāgasanī Ājñālapatī is able to recall for himself the events of the thirteen times.
Ānanda.

source_sentence: 阿智　那智　仇那智　踔踦　踔茶踦　樓樓彌　醯離　毘離　疋離能自憶念十四世事。
translation: 阿智　那智　仇那智　踔踦　踔茶踦　樓樓彌　醯離　毘離　疋離能自憶念十四世事。
Ānanda.

source_sentence: 此呪是九十九億諸佛所說。
translation: This dhāraṇī was taught by 9.9 billion buddhas.

source_sentence: 是陀羅尼經　　諸佛先已說
translation: "This is a dhāraṇī sentence that was taught by the buddhas before us.

source_sentence: 我今亦演暢　　饒益眾生故
translation: I will now also explain it fully for the benefit of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若人聞此呪　　廣生信樂心
translation: If someone hears this dhāraṇī, he will give rise to a profound state of faith and happiness.

source_sentence: 能憶念前世　　至于十四生
translation: able to recall past lives and up to fourteen lives

source_sentence: 人有信樂心　　聞持如此呪
translation: "If a person has faith and is happy, he hears and upholds this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 其所住來處　　不遭諸厄難
translation: where he comes from, he will not encounter any hardships

source_sentence: 無有人非人　　鳩槃富單那
translation: there is neither human nor non-human, Kumbhâṇḍa-pūtanā

source_sentence: 能為作惱患　　誦持此呪故
translation: This dhāraṇī can be used to inflict harm.

source_sentence: 不為刀所傷　　毒亦不能害
translation: not harmed by a sword, nor can poison harm.

source_sentence: 不為他所殺　　誦持此呪故
translation: Not to be killed by others Because you recite and uphold this dhāraṇī

source_sentence: 天魔王波旬　　欲界中特尊
translation: Deva Māra King Pāpīyān, the most honored of the desire realm

source_sentence: 不能作留難　　誦持此呪故
translation: cannot raise objections because of the recitation of this dhāraṇī

source_sentence: 父母及兄弟　　眷屬及親友
translation: parents, brothers, relatives, and friends

source_sentence: 不逢諸衰禍　　誦持此呪故
translation: does not meet with calamity because of the recitation of this dhāraṇī

source_sentence: 於百千億劫　　造作不善業
translation: creates unwholesome activity during 100,000,000,000,000 eons

source_sentence: 七日能令淨　　誦持此呪故
translation: seven days will purify the Dharma because of the recitation of this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 菩薩於億劫　　積集諸福德
translation: Over hundreds of millions of eons, the bodhisattvas accumulate merit.

source_sentence: 七日能令勝　　誦持此呪故
translation: seven days will make it possible to overcome... by reciting and upholding this dhāraṇī

source_sentence: 四大天王等　　護世間四方
translation: four celestial kings and others who protect the four directions of the world

source_sentence: 拘毘羅提頭　　博叉毘樓茶
translation: Kubilantī Bhikṣu Virūḍhaka

source_sentence: 大臣諸眷屬　　歡喜而稱讚
translation: the ministers and their retinues rejoice and praise

source_sentence: 恭敬常守護　　誦持此呪故
translation: Respectfully and constantly guard... because you recite and uphold this dhāraṇī

source_sentence: 安隱囑累滿具足王如來　　紺琉璃具足王如來　勸助眾善具足王如來　無憂德具足王如來　藥師具足王如來　蓮華具足王如來　算擇合會具足王如來　解散一切縛具足王如來　持八佛名　疾得無上道　　億劫阿僧祇　行惡悉消除　　速得明解教　飛行到諸剎　　疾得泥洹道南無佛陀　南無達　摩南無僧伽　南無摩呵梨師　毘闍羅闍　譪屈陀　建陀　娑滿馱跋闍　邏翅陀建崛茶誓茶　遮利遮利摩訶遮利哹摩利哹摩勒翅　悉耽鞞闍鞞　阿闍鞞匊究匊匊翅　薩婆陀羅尼翅　阿扇提　摩俱梨摩詣　呼彌呼彌呼摩呼摩娑禍呵過去無量諸佛所說。
translation: 安隱囑累滿具足王如來　　紺琉璃具足王如來　勸助眾善具足王如來　無憂德具足王如來　藥師具足王如來　蓮華具足王如來　算擇合會具足王如來　解散一切縛具足王如來　持八佛名　疾得無上道　　億劫阿僧祇　行惡悉消除　　速得明解教　飛行到諸剎　　疾得泥洹道南無佛陀　南無達　摩南無僧伽　南無摩呵梨師　毘闍羅闍　譪屈陀　建陀　娑滿馱跋闍　邏翅陀建崛茶誓茶　遮利遮利摩訶遮利哹摩利哹摩勒翅　悉耽鞞闍鞞　阿闍鞞匊究匊匊翅　薩婆陀羅尼翅　阿扇提　摩俱梨摩詣　呼彌呼彌呼摩呼摩娑禍呵過去無量諸佛所說。

source_sentence: 未來彌勒賢劫菩薩亦當宣說。
translation: The good bodhisattva Maitreya of the future will also teach it.
"It's a good remedy for the four major additions and subtractions.
It also cures the mind's four hundred and four internal illnesses.

source_sentence: 亦治業障犯戒諸惡永盡。
translation: It also cures the karmic hindrances, transgressions, and evils that are permanently ended.

source_sentence: 尊勝菩薩陀羅尼經一卷。
translation: One volume of the Dhāraṇī of the Venerable Victorious Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 尊勝菩薩所問經譯師傳
translation: Zunsheng pusa suowen jing translator's biography
Kaiyuanlu said.
In the era of Gaoqi.
There was a layman named Wan Tianyi.
His original family name was Tuo (pronounced "to") Bo.
He was from Yunzhong in Beidai.
The Wei dynasty was divided into ten surnames.
It was because of the Wan (phonetic) and Qi (phonetic) clans.
They lived in Luoyang from generation to generation.

source_sentence: 故復為河南人(題云天竺者非)。
translation: Therefore, they were also from Henan (the title is wrong, it's from Tianzhong).
Later, he was simply called the Wan family.
Yi had left home as a young man.
He studied under a Brāhmaṇa teacher.
He was wise and had the strength of will.
He was good at writing and speaking Sanskrit.
He was also skilled in spells.

source_sentence: 由是應召得預翻傳之數。
translation: Thus, he was called upon to preface the transmission of numerous teachings.
It was in the middle of Emperor Wushō's Zhanheqing year that he translated a copy of the Zunsheng pusa suowen jing at the capital.

source_sentence: 於鄴都自譯尊勝菩薩所問經一部。
translation: In Zunsheng's capital, he translated a scripture called Zunsheng pusa suowen.

source_sentence: 廣行於世矣(與無崖際持經同本)。
translation: It was widely disseminated throughout the world (the same text as the Wuyiji jing).
